attributes.action: ensure that WALES is represented on the NEW COINS before they go into circulation later this year.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Photographs/details of the new coins have now been revealed. 

Unfortunately, Wales is not represented on the new coins due for circulation later this year. 

Therefore, the coins need to be altered to give a true representation of the whole of "United Kingdom".
